channel.description: Recent content in blog on Vatsalya Tandon

item.title: Live object detection in browser using YOLO
item.description: In this blog we are going to develop a live image classifier through webcam feed right in our browser using the model - YOLO This whole task requires the following two libraries : ml5.js, an easy-to-use ML framework built on top of Tensorflow.js p5.js, a JS library to facilitate easy design and drawing functionality 1) Create directory and files First of all create a directory of the name of your project (say “YOLO-ML5”).

item.title: First Post
item.description: Thanks to spf13 and bep for creating the world’s fastest static site generator Hugo. Kudos to vividvilla for this theme! Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. Learn more and contribute on GitHub.
